isis.stitle: Procedural Guideline - FUEL INJECTOR LEFT BANK REAR INJECTOR, REPLACE

wtsproc.wtsdescrip: FUEL INJECTOR LEFT BANK REAR INJECTOR, REPLACE

step1.para: Chock wheels.
Open hood, disconnect support shocks, and raise hood support for access.
Disconnect battery.
Remove complete engine cover housing.
Remove floor panel section by accelerator pedal area for access.
Remove both charge air pipes and air intake pipe for access.
Remove wire harness and hose support clamps at frame area left side. Secure hose for access.
Disconnect wire harness at valve cover and reposition for access.
Remove hose clamp at valve cover breather tube and remove breather tube.
Disconnect wire connection at valve cover gasket connection.
Remove bolts/nuts and retaining valve cover. Remove cover.
Remove fuel and oil plugs from cylinder head to relieve pressure.
Disconnect wire connector at injector.
Remove injector oil spill spout. Remove injector hold down clamp bolt.
Remove injector seals.
Install injector seals and lubricate with clean engine oil.
Install shoulder bolt and torque bolt. Install injector with hold down and torque hold down bolt. Install oil spill spout and secure.
Install fuel and oil plugs on cylinder head and torque plugs.
Install bolts/nuts/retaining valve cover. Torque bolts/nuts.
Connect wire connection at valve cover gasket connection.
Install breather tube and secure with hose clamp.
Install wire harness and hose support clamps at frame area left side and secure.
Install both charge air pipes and air intake pipe.
Install floor panel section by accelerator pedal area.
Install complete engine cover housing.
Connect battery.
Connect hood and support shocks.
Check engine oil, start engine, and check for leaks.
Remove wheel chocks.
Road test vehicle to bleed air from oil supplied to injector.
